title: Slower German inflation quickens debate over ECB
text:
Slower German inflation quickens debate over ECB 8:33am EST - 01:53 
German inflation slowed more than expected to hit a 15-month-low in February, data showed on Tuesday, suggesting that price pressures in Europe's largest economy are muted despite a robust upswing, rising wages and unprecedented monetary stimulus. David Pollard reports on the latest twists in the euro zone rates debate.
